What is the name of the HBO zombie apocalypse series mentioned in the article?
The Last of Us
What is the real-life fungus that inspired the fictional cordyceps in the show?
Ophiocordyceps unilateralis
Which creatures are affected by the cordyceps fungus in real life?
ants, spiders, moths, locusts, and other arthropods
What do the cordyceps spores release to break down an insect's cuticle?
digestive enzymes
What are the threadlike growths that grow inward and take over the insect's brain called?
mycelia
How does the infected ant behave to benefit the cordyceps?
climbs up the tree trunk and bites the stem or leaf in a death grip
What is one reason cordyceps fungus is not likely to affect humans?
humans are warm-blooded with high body temperatures
What is an example of a yeast that has emerged with climate change?
Candida auris
What kind of infections can Candida auris cause?
bloodstream infections, wound infections, infections in organs like brain and heart
What should people do to stay connected to reality when it comes to science fiction?
listen to public health
